chapter.title: API Operations for Client Developers

section.title: Users
section.para: The operations described in this section allow clients to manage users.

note.para:
Some of the functionality described in this section is provided by the OS-KSADM and RAX-KSKEY extensions to the core Identity API. You can learn more about API extensions at
https://github.com/openstack/identity-api/tree/master/openstack-identity-api/src/docbkx/.

warning.para: If you use this POST /users call to create a user, that user will have access to APIs but will not have access to the Cloud Control Panel. Cloud Control Panel access is provided to the account's admin user; the admin user is the user who initiated the account by completing the Sign-Up process.
